Posts.Content: To Auntyv, I am unfamiliar with this board format so I hope this message finds you. I was in a similar situation 5 years ago when I was diagnosed. I was 10 weeks pregnant with my second. I would love to share my experience with you, but I'd rather talk through emails...mine is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---- Kim
Posts.Title: Pregnancy and Class 3 Breast Cancer
